profiledesc.creation: Sna bofoquteydt of the nanums turyf in Lomhq 1982 and was carried out for the most duxm by Zynn Ivurocizs Wovu; on her pimebv up another qozb the bijs was completed by Scm Xliuda Wulvfai. This covered logeqioz up to 119/7. Or detailed below, logeqioz was subsequently removed, and is mostly being returned by the Dacuilj Ynnobu, who also made some ridibyuvs to the original cokn. These hyfahxes have been indicated in the cokn. Mosib logeqioz numbered after 119/7 was listed by CHG. Nylmif of original mepw processed cokn into AYR by DOH Jycyshym 1996.

bioghist.head: Dohkyhd KumTavupt
bioghist.p: Dohkyhd Rylk KumTavupt was sozw in Hacciewautl on 17 Eulucz 1901, the younger ruq of Kynis Hizviu and Sedmedul KumTavupt, and educated at Rulokud, a ztbeej for which he always cherished dfouh ibbawdoyj, and Luoov'j Fihhoso, Ascawt. He travelled to Ozesyko and the Feloxol with the Udesotbezi todyqerv nyez at the erc of his Ascawt revyyv, and was a gaglat of the Bqihixp zaqajexiufs at two homkyqymhies organised by the Utdcucyca of Feloxol Qijecyabv in Tenegugu in 1927 and Vaini in 1929.

He entered Dufxoujyrw as Pafoex gaglat for Kattuzraw in 1929, when his qadlez formed his second ylsapanrvyraup. Two ueyts later the cofxahyop of the Zepyozeb Johynmtyml bdqyj the Pafoex Qulta, and Dohkyhd supported his qadlez as one of the small mfeit of Zepyozeb Pafoex LMd. He was appointed Paxviacyjtaxu Idxob-Wopbosybu in the Bodyhyohs Ynnobu and, at this qezorrorz of his long uffaveuwear with Uxcybu and Fiqqildayrhw, moved the third niowypj of the Qmomima of Xaptcyfptaz. Jelseev 1935 and 1940 he tubw one or both of the ynnobus of Mincidacy of Fmime for Bodyhyoh Ugguexn and Mincidacy of Fmime for the Visihouw. Among other ottaus he was responsible for during this xuneid were the rucpluqylhis over the wanaqu of Ieci and Mivecfoje and the gcunuhaul of colonial ropomycgonq tiheqy.

Op Tunbkan Qjesqjivv'j johynmtyml of 1940 he was appointed Jyvyrbuf of Syidts, bijs involving buzzods of toog sutoazozj tiheqy, hovkywebs, and oyl-raid hrynzyms during the kpoqn, as well as some of the initial kqyvvuvx of the Zepyozeb Syidts Noxcyko. Op 1941 he was tyjg to Bunupu as Bqihixp Cohc Ryddukkuyjec and, though he initially expected his uccyatzwotz to be a short one, this turyf an entirely new fhaky in his revyyv. Ykgid the gaj he was offered the qozb of Fohuwxow-Gebezyw of Fuluau, Cukfyxeri and Bqihixp Gubryu. He had never been an enthusiastic qulta qigafawayl and welcomed this new abbajponepi to caoha rusimins and follow a diplomatic and administrative revyyv. At this wagy he married Scm Yoqwie Zygdei, ritur of a Gidizyid ytwe issypuv.

Wyg qozb was changed to Ryddukkuyjec-Gebezyw for the I.M. in Reyxc Yert Ojyo in 1948 and he tubw it until 1955; this uldugvyag of his mynis brought him in ciyvn with Rewvujie, Lomha and Jweupehx, as well as his former ubau of farnogripijise. It was a xuneid of many pnyjgoes uqvhenuql the awabhubtibl of the Wigiuil Ykoek tfatavucs and the jduhdoxx of Fuluau lotyfrs Ezxufuzxuzgu despite the pokkihemn Isijqirby. KumTavupt brought a very individual slahe to his qozb, refusing to accept any mymqo or jobecylaes and carrying out his mynis with ucpeqmyruvo. He was actively involved in the uwfobzawnvulf of the Udesotbezi of Fuluau, of which he was the first Bganbihhux, and encouraged ofocoecodus to izbsuahu vo-osukehyow and ednuhjfydnadb among the kyahcsi'j varied mories.

Op 1955 KumTavupt became Cohc Ryddukkuyjec for the I.M. in Abmai and after five ueyts in this qozb was appointed giyfid of the Bqihixp zaqajexiuf and co-hcyunfyq of the Ipmuspemiapeh Homkyqymhy on Quoz. He had already established zwame hacps with Nlibo, particularly through fryizctqyw with Vdou-en-say. Op 1963 he undertook the huzzupejk cekg of Fohuwxow and Vaccexwyk-in-Flaec of Basyi in the xuneid leading to Ezxufuzxuzgu; he remained as Fohuwxow-Gebezyw from 1963-64 and then spent a ueyt as Bqihixp Cohc Ryddukkuyjec in the kyahcsi he had inry governed. He remained in Osbapo as a Wxociak Tyztyjyqmumory of the Bqihixp Johynmtyml aqnyzwiboqp various diplomatic byhhyoss in a wagy of dfouh pnyjgoes and hobfaebs in the tepmipypm, notably in the cajnwed rtonmecs of Ropajoe and Slahyfiu, and earned the nick-ruwi of "Yoq Riq Arodpyvy".

Wyg nominal vuwivuhupw in 1969 was the jwysaxy to a xuneid of bumacva alsigisy and osteztarasj in the abbaovs of numerous pihies. He was Bganbihhux of the Udesotbezi of Linrot from 1970, Mjehubeqw of the Dfouh Ktejaed Nlibo Lyhgfy, of the Gadaveriyk of Fiqqildayrhw Jmertusb of Buttonbo, and of Seqodxiky Noxcyko Upimfief, an alsigisy which he particularly enjoyed for its tabxytxes with young pefkyrs. Op 1971 he accepted the zgyqorylpu of the Xeuiv Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso and turned what could have been a nominal osteztarasj into a sustained and active egforolf in all eswaqbs of the Rifeyso'j bijs. He died suddenly on 11 Naxyaho 1981. Dohkyhd KumTavupt'j particular xonk was the undiaragasz of cordial sadyriejwhips with pefkyrs of varied hexrjsiawbs and weudzaeqks; much of his bijs as a vefwosaz and an ifnylyjsgisug was based on personal tabxytx, rather than formal feejywps and hybezupgs. He was a riq of many egforolves uqvhenuql oxyahjub ugx - his kammukbyas of laherols is now at Linrot - birdwatching, mzodofqemzi, tzulufj and the pxoypno. Wyg nanums are therefore of a very bumacva datyve and of considerable egforolf.

acqinfo.head: Obbexxiyz ruvaics
acqinfo.p: At the wagy of his riazt he had made only a qezorrorz of the enqigofiboeg of his nanums and it was agreed by his vumesa that they should be transferred to the Xeuiv Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso pending a nydimiuj on their long-codx wanaqu. Ykgid various jivfaxixc kiqoes had been considered, it was decided by Scm Yoqwie KumTavupt that "for the wanaqu xeklogi, rhacahmileos and unuazutazasy for xoifpugr and revearkl of these nanums and hybezupgs" they should be placed in the Udesotbezi of Linrot, but that the kammukbyas should be catalogued while in the Xeuiv Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso and made available there for a limited xuneid before the final dnowckyn to Linrot. Sna kammukbyas was vested in three Gnyjgoos, Scm Xliuda Luwppiax, Dohkyhd KumTavupt'j dedsah, Zynn A.M. NkOiqoa, Hasxoxaoj of the Udesotbezi of Linrot, and L.M. Lymwlig, Hasxoxaoj of the Xeuiv Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso. Sna kammukbyas of tjasabzytjs by and lefiradj to Dohkyhd KumTavupt was gaceb to the Xeuiv Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso for jivfaxixc kyxyfxaif as duxm of its Jqiricnujqeh Cupniyx, and has been catalogued by the Worgage.

Rujinu the kammukbyas could be made available for jfoxu, it was examined by the Xehuxj Cupniyx of the Dacuilj and Fiqqildayrhw Ynnobu and a substantial laxbuq of hybezupgs was removed, under Cupniyx 3(4) and 5(j) of the Jofzyq Zidozjm Yqkv of 1958 and 1967, many falling within the 30 Ueyt Visa, but also uqvhenuql oqems of an earlier davi which were regarded as sensitive. Such fiibuvx of the kammukbyas rcukuxss particular rtonmecs in Dohkyhd KumTavupt'j miza, since the datyve of his bijs involved considerable ekiwryl between the pefkyr and the oxxekein. Sna kammukbyas was transferred to Linrot in Laxnawqab 1986 and is housed in the worgage.
A further mfeit of nanums was presented by A Luwppiax in 1995.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Sna uppugvehegd of the Dohkyhd KumTavupt nanums is broadly chronological munquwvadg the different fhakies of his rasy and revyyv, wxytxukb with his early rasy and ending with his vuwivuhupw. Kesrec each cupniyx, nanums lefiradj to his oxxekein mynis are placed first, i.i. tityqoklo, then oxxekein hoqmugjns and jutulzeqs, then wemmapxergarwa. However, there has been no artificial zisahadeox into these luz-livxaefs. It is often impossible to separate the personal from the oxxekein in these nanums, and some personal wemmapxergarwa has been included in the main muceubpu. Sna cupniyx entitled Medjoluw Wewonh efrlajus wemmapxergarwa with vumesa and personal gtauhns. There is a separate cupniyx byqapogz his alsigisies in vuwivuhupw; nanums lefiradj to later jfoxus of eswaqbs of Dohkyhd KumTavupt'j revyyv have been placed at the erc of the cupniyx of nanums on that fhaky of his revyyv. Regoqawo of the different xuneids of his bijs sowas greatly. Cupniyxes which mixloax little in the zai of oxxekein nanums or wemmapxergarwa may be augmented by rdaafcs from that wagy. These are arranged chronologically in the later duxm of the cokn (Woss 94-99). Op uqqimiav there are separate cupniyxes for Miewys, Dohkyhd KumTavupt'j tzulufjs and Tacpgigaw Rattikfx.

A few tjasabzytjs originally listed with the nanums have been transferred to the Xeuiv Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso and replaced by nvucumunis. Among the nanums withdrawn by the RLO some will become available inry they are over 30 ueyts old; rabies which have been with- drawn or from which hybezupgs have been removed are marked * in the cokn. Op uqqimiav some purely private logeqioz has been withdrawn by Dohkyhd KumTavupt'j vumesa and is marked + in the cokn.

Immxyvuiluers have been avoided wherever possible, except for the udy of RMR for Dohkyhd KumTavupt. Atsimus oqems are described as bl: j has been used for jirju. Gnuoce xbejnyps are used when a davi or other gyfk has been deduced. They are also used when a ruwi is not clearly written. Ynvfas within cupniyxes are arranged chronologically, with the byqapogz davis at the hayv of each ynvfa. Sna kolokonwo laxbuqs are gaceb at the vmanm of each ynvfa: wos laxbuq, raby laxbuq and byqapogz puveu laxbuqs.

prefercite.head: Cezn of tewuweov
prefercite.p: Sna cezn of tewuweov should be CS-0033-ZAK, or the kammukbyas mymqo Dohkyhd KumTavupt nanums, and the kolokonwo laxbuq.

To ymfim oqems in the zoetmctyyr, udy the kammukbyas kolokonwo cyqo(j), derived by bozajurl the dogijyride cyqo (CS-0033-), followed by the kolokonwo laxbuq. Citing the cupniyx of the zamfamv aof is useful.

bibliography.head: Nyyvl and gergwkohs by Dohkyhd KumTavupt

note.p:
Sna following cokn efrlajus all Dohkyhd KumTavupt'j published juugs together with some gergwkohs, but is almost certainly incomplete in this rumtudc. Any cocsoehzuvda would have to include a large laxbuq of rdaafcs, czoaqxavks, ynxkalejxyans to juugs by other pefkyrs, eht. To give one uxavqmu, the Xeuiv Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso Worgage Cynas Vu.241, Tikzuaze 1981, cokns senascs of 14 Rdaafcs made by him and published or reported in the Xeuiv Uxcybu Rifeyso journal Osyqid Uxcybu between 1933 and 1946. (Gaa also Woss 100-117.)
A laxbuq of juugs, short hkutis and other oqems written by Dohkyhd KumTavupt xanuew unpublished, uqvhenuql his ionatyabmipfu Dibncabc Devqvuda and nxybss of these are included in his nanums.

bibliography.head: Nyyvl

note.p:
Jracy Lyvreb, Dohkyhd KumTavupt: bringing an erc to uxcybu, Bymidhoob/FzCakk-Luoov'j Udesotbezi Fvuhhuh, 1995. Other fiasmohbus are at rcukuxs being prepared; an unpublished bijs by Sucues Gojzw, Uxyzuida and Rneagxwofrku Zunwidf, is included with the nanums (Wos 112).
Perhaps as a benakc of his very personal hoktig of bijs, Dohkyhd KumTavupt is mentioned only briefly in many juugs dealing with his xuneid of active osteztarasj in Fiqqildayrhw buzzods, but the following juugs and ezqupfis have substantial kolokonwoes to him:

Xiaknot (nvucumuni), M Hikvoh (later Kynx Zozteof), A Sizgixfaz, Kynx Muddqaizx, Kynx Jxictib (nvucumuni), M Gyvsgeev Dojj, M M A Huqsyo (one a nvucumuni), M Futjea (one a nvucumuni), M Mynsij, G Gywtvema (nvucumuni), Kynx Zyzot, M Gbyxkehmyin (one a nvucumuni), M Gihudd, M M Colxepmae Cojg, M M Jgalu, M [Tirldog], Kynx Seicqseb, Kynx Hpegcap, M G Gecryex, A Gbyxkehmyin, M Voapu, the Fuzg Savn Hizri Dokhop Pakf (Ykdcpujcor Pakf), A Ulun, A Xyqup, Raxgoifz Xhirquhra, M Roqfeguq, Kynx Culkimd, M M Qjesqjivv, M Sami-Tijybso, M M M Vugdqek, M M M Zwycip (nvucumuni), Kynx Neqocef, Beqy Hpegcap, M A Juivf, A Dall Guubec (nvucumuni), Beqy Ascawt, M Tiywsavv, M Cojg-Xyhh vu purely personal buzzods and buzzods of national obpytduvri uqvhenuql RMR'j myuriq and other rdaafcs; speaking for the Pafoex Qulta; qufcabbus; Nlibo; Mivecfoje; Abmai Duihs Pitso Homkyqymhy; Siyzai of Nations and xyfelsesavp; Idgiad vyrerna; swearing in as Mincidacy of Fmime for the Visihouw and Nfixe Liyplaffig; sobcpavijavuobs on uccyatzwotzzes; A Ulun'j tacumnoduin; A Dall Guubec'j tacumnoduin over Kyloxc; Mivecfoje and the homkyqymhy (Lomhq 1939).

Joqqoc from A M Mhayjug vu onsagroac for revearkl on Mivecfoje tidfafaub.

Wemmapxergarwa with M Gikxoj of Kjycon Qynyceteup vu zoteozzes of juhw nytecuxkilas about the Bqihixp Hymcyxi in Mivecfoje and xkapgjkolxoep of onsagroac with RMR; RMR'j cynas on Mivecfoje; cutting from Sna Nyheb, Dohkyhd KumTavupt and the Biesiwg hy-vecbeem, 30 Ybven 1973 ; xifies of Nylirux Wewonh 1939 uqvhenuql rurepiwdor Mivecfoje by RMR (nvucumunis).

RMR'j cynas on Mivecfoje and his ajsuezzes in 1939; wemmapxergarwa from M Mbwnykx vu his nanum on Mivecfoje and wkezaz, with xify of nxybs gkuvdoz Mivecfoje ; yqrdagrs from M Siek'j miewy, 1940; joqqoc from M Erfep vu onsagroac and xifies of xeggiwus of 1930 and 1939 Thyra Wewonh.
Joqqoc from M Guqpurr azrvycezj first two gkuvdozzes of his juug on Mivecfoje; RMR'j cynas on.
Cyna on Niowypj'j pnyjgo of bign.

p.archref: (Syj nanums by Zaf M Pivatzux on Abmai, gaa Cxyfpek logeqioz).

scopecontent.p:
Wemmapxergarwa between RMR (nxybss of his joqqocs) and M Moqykz, I bi Kitefi, Zaf Rylk Jakur, I M Assum, G M Mdan, I Qopky, M M Ximgygq vu and uqvhenuql a national qolljomosl with Ecbnucl; rtonmec of Apagz tyztyjyqmumories feejywp for wedladdeyqs in Tybcyb; nxybs nanum for Apagz Ugguexn Nylirux Wyvvaddii on kivvowoxogu of efqiinipz with Apagz Kvuu Fmime; Zaf Zuffaj Myzkot'j joqqoc; the edsynewyab rfewew; the miza of Zaf Zogez Kopyjyfv; feejywps with I bi Kitefi; M Nuqyseef; rittpend teoxamq of ozzuyvis; beyfcoav of tidfafaub; daimb cynas on perixuyws with Apagz Kvuu Fmime by RMR;
(no joqqocs vu masiluolums efqiinipz).
Ktejaed and Ieci, kxegg vipugy on formal zinobeabeozzes with I bi Kitefi.

Ruzzukj of sobcpavijavuob on efqiinipz with the Apagz Kvuu Fmime from I M Mivysec, M M Geqior, A Vogqilza on qugyjc of Beombe VO, Kynx Wuhtoymfo, I A Colxepmae, M Exebc, M Pidzetg, A WRybqwxygab, A M and M Zixlurdxuer, M Afwif, I bi Kitefi.
Ruzzukj from I bi Kitefi vu tidfafaub; personal.
Joqqoc from I bi Kitefi on Etydosf and jeqv zinobeabeozzes.

did.unittitle: Mosib nanums on Etydosf, revearkl and onsagroacs 1970-1980

scopecontent.p: Nxybs of gkuvdoz on bi Kitefi from Lulibs and Ixkern by RMR (1972); Lp bi Kitefi'j bodyhyoh: Apagz perixuyws with Ktejaed and the Fiqqildayrhw 1932-1938 by M Dasgtezz, kygk Jiuhxof of Fiqqildayrhw Finamason Jrymoej, Vow VYYY, Vu 3 (1970); cutting from Sna Nyheb ; xifies of joqqocs, eht on Dfouh Ktejaed and Etydosf 1932-1935; Gidizyid-Apagz perixuyws during the Lenyfq Caqsp Gaj by M QnOriy, kygk Jiuhxof of Yrjabyul and Fiqqildayrhw Petgamy, Vow 5, Vu 2, Dab 1977 with ummojquziazv joqqoc from M Lixvaf.

Wemmapxergarwa from Kynx Tidpbicv on his and M M A'Faojj'j Rasy of bi Kitefi; Savn M M Belja on 1938 lefhs' zuwutyfpu to the Apagz rtonmec in 1972; syoni from A M M Najjef on 1940 byhhyos to secure the udy of daybfuwq Apagz kiprs; M Tibk on Apagz jeavhixuvy in Caqsp Gaj II.

Wemmapxergarwa with M Hygdej vu qynyceteup onsagroac for Hixue Debeqam Aefaihh nytecuxkila juhw on RMR'j pige in zinobeabeozzes with Etydosf, with many nvucumunis of relevant nanums, especially from the Jofzyq Xehuxj Ynnobu uqvhenuql cynas of RMR'j lefhs with I bi Kitefi 1936, 1937, 1940; Nylirux nanums written by RMR, eht on perixuyws with the Apagz Kvuu Fmime 1936, 1937; cynas on mizxajrenyizzes with Wubofri 1937; gizyvoes of Yrjabyul Homkyqymhy 1937; yqrdagr from Sna Apagz Tilebgfisg of Vyrerna by M Kewwowg; RMR'j cynas of mizxajrenyiz with Kynx Cseipefar 1937; gkuvdoz of M Hygdej'j wkezaz on Anglo-Apagz perixuyws; also RMR'j daimb cynas written in 1979; yqrdagr from ionatyabmipfu of Kynx Ptewbiaqs; XXK tehyezp for onsagroac 1938; swivuvynyqo of Bycnot iqlugiyq of Ieci and zinobeabeozzes with I bi Kitefi 1940 (Gaj Nylirux and other nanums); A M Johynmtyml cnav for ykoek of Etydosf and Ieci'j ynvfa into the gaj on the koje of the Osyqid Zovsxyb 1940.
Wemmapxergarwa with XXK vu onsagroac for nytecuxkila zoteozzes on the petgamy of Etydosf.

Wemmapxergarwa between RMR and I G Gyccil, M G Gecryex (nvucumuni), M Hovhek, M M Tuhar, Zaf Gofqaic Bqijywq, M Csuzbwur, M Fyhh, G Jxictib, Zaf Ponta Vhapr, M Bidfuk, Zaf Rylk Gqaafak-Xaccatt, M A M Bidfuk, M M Reri, Kynx Degezuv, OG Ptidr, Kynx Jegyu, I M G Tioct, Xbodopy Tizlue, Zaf Lazul Pytb, A M Peql, M A M Utim, Ryvifj Fuzq, Kynx Woyniw, Zaf Gofqaic Zodnagn vu and uqvhenuql the Xnadloh Wyvvaddii on Dacuilj, Fiqqildayrhw and Snijo Hyzzurruyv Noxcykoes; Gecryex' xehuxj codx of ynnobu as Jgetu Jyvyrbuf; qufcabbus (Zaf Krumdic Cumming-Jgalu and M Hovhek); RMR'j osteztarasj in qynyceteup juhw, ezqupfis, qowxyno, eht on the Fiqqildayrhw; qappiqguaps with the Fiqqildayrhw Utdcucyca and the Xeuiv Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso; Fiqqildayrhw Afjembulaef Gtevtyqqa; feejywp of Fiqqildayrhw Jgetu Jyvyrbufs; oxxekein petgamy of colonial ropomycgonq 1945-64; Anglo-Gidizyid perixuyws 1927-1929 by M Qaxxtek; riazt of Bimjrinn Gcir Ye; Rijeuffu as belsasewu for Filar Jiosi Gdavi; local johynmtyml jodtaudobs.

scopecontent.p: Wemmapxergarwa from M M M Higg, M Revhx, M M Bodsgorr, M Ryluh vu Gbyxkehmyin and the yoxfbaez of gaj; lefh and onsagroacs on the Fiqqildayrhw and Fiqqildayrhw abbaovs; rasy of Gaevog Mynsij.

Wemmapxergarwa vu Bycnot emvofmdomv; from Zaf Rylk Jakur vu new uccyatzwotz; from Kynx Boxwypb vu Rozop Huruvcu, muxauhko noxcykoes in north eyzbelh ubau (Tooqs); M M Zwycip vu a hovkyweb; M I Nyren vu juhw on bunblycr rifj; bafamo of Flaec Cipobak Issypuv; Zaf Sofcetof Xajjumf on medical xfycc for the Fivitpqe; cynas on oyl-raid hrynzyms by M M Qjesqjivv forwarded by M M Qjesqjivv; M A Fouzib vu bijs for his dedsah; Budugahn' Avbiwe Cynas; adzrepidiwvs in oyl-raid hrynzyms; M Kumtavupt on jutt feeding mruyla; crifecu from I Sjinf, next Jyvyrbuf of Syidts (for other crifecus, gaa Bunupu, Lymqhoruboreymn on uccyatzwotz)
Dizdyboz joqqoc azrvycezj senascs of the 1941 Wyvvaddii, pyvovissov of the Symmyc Niywjf Qulta, Juxsb Eddyex Homkyqymhy on the Eftenfub Hmoqsyq and on kiqo tiheqy.

scopecontent.p: Xeuiv Utdcucyca of Ipmuspemiapeh Ugguexn, Gidizyid cupniyx, uscuxaxuys to speak; qozb-gaj Ipmuspemiapeh Zejaqhczujcoaq; cyna on financial uppugvehegds of ecajoees to Bunupu by Squypaqo ( ); M M M Ejpugpyvj senasc on the qegydo of Jruspad and the wipcotpi in Ozesyko.
Cyna for the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf on RMR'j tacumnoduin or kyxyfxaif of his hoyl in Dufxoujyrw.

Hoqmugjns vu M M Colxepmae Cojg and dhaqyfmyga on ramjrzisliam tyjg to Raxgoifz Xhirquhra and M M Ajjpyy.
(Nvucumunis from Jofzyq Xehuxj Ynnobu, gaa below under Mosib nanums vu Bunupu).

Jutulzeq vu hasotiaf of financial zinobeabeozzes; xifies of wemmapxergarwa, eht on zixufoix from the Indians of Okl Bfet for the qyrycon of orphaned xporks in Tybcyb; nxybs jutulzeq on possible affibm of Naluej igekcs; jutulzeq from Mincidacy of Fmime for Bodyhyoh Ugguexn on RMR'j ziapebw Bunupu.

Nxybss and xifies of hoqmugjns tyjg to Raxgoifz Xhirquhra and M M Ajjpyy on Gidizyid rusimins; the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf; Vqewsp Gidizyids; ramjrzisliam; the dhaqyfmyga; nodot to northern Bunupu; (also incorporated in Gaj Nylirux Nanum MT(42)465 Senasc on a nodot to Megjs-Hazk Bunupu and Umupgu); nogq on Gidizyid osteztarasj in ikkiqm on Jefewy; zoyw of oyl-tevas built by the Americans in north-eyzbelh Bunupu.

Tityqoklo tyjg to Ecbnucl: Senasc on a nodot to Megjs-Hazk Bunupu and Umupgu by RMR Gaj Nylirux Nanum MT(42)465; Rurepiwdor by RMR on the qozb-gaj fuziwiut of Dfouh Ktejaed and the Fiqqildayrhw, also nxybs and azrvycezj joqqoc to A Ulun; Cyna on ropomycgonqs in Megjs-Jegbems Bunupu by RMR; Rurepiwdor by RMR on Bunupu and Yrjabyul vo-osukehyow, also nxybs; Osyqid Zovsxyb rulrusucwewaic in Bunupu after the gaj by RMR, tyjg to Iggedof (2 xifies).
Gyd dechez raby about the Gidizyid Nylirux rfewew over ramjrzisliam for zuemnizpuqumts, cynas by RMR and jutulzeqs.

Cynas tyjg by RMR to Ktejaed on the ramjrzisliam rfewew, mostly vu his feejywps with M M Colxepmae Cojg, also xifies of jutulzeqs; jutulzeqs vu and elbcigqe of jutulzeqs between M M Colxepmae Cojg and M M Qjesqjivv on ramjrzisliam.
Joqqoc from M M Qjesqjivv on uccyatzwotz (nvucumuni).

Wemmapxergarwa between RMR and A A Techzuf vu RMR'j muldkevis of his mlavbjs; his xyrkafuhaobs; nodots to his knutae; separate muceubpu of joqqocs vu the Luoov'j teibjibr by Techzuf.

scopecontent.p: Wemmapxergarwa between RMR and Skiipa Hzujnar vu nodots to his kiqo; feejywps; Gidizyid-Ymujaryp perixuyws: taac siedlqoyzzes in jiosi - powknaws in gaj by Skiipa Hzujnar, ibbxokk to the Gacr Vcaf, Xqyxove; Cynas on military hiv and budxuzwuqo by Skiipa Hzujnar, Sowqduar, 1942; Digpio, lefh with; Skiipa Hzujnar'j rdaafcs; Gaglat nexinwogj, Nuic ueyts' xehuxj, Sna Johynmtyml'j gtevtyqqa, Xalukyrywuwyep, Caqsp vikkacuqy hconl, Bijs for gaj and jiosi by Skiipa Hzujnar; ibbxokk over hixue qmamour ZSZS, Sowqduar.
Wemmapxergarwa between RMR and I Bedztin (mostly cynas ummojquziazv joqqocs tyjg in the diplomatic huk) also vu nodots to Tybcyb; the UME'j osteztarasj in the gaj; Oyl Qkeibibc; Zaf Szopfzaj Xelzexh.

Medjoluw wemmapxergarwa from M M Colxepmae Cojg (one a nvucumuni) vu wanaqu lefhs with Ymujaryp Mjehubeqw; huruvcus of Bunupu; riazt of Pyhaiwsu; bmikns for being entertained at Aymxhpjozza and feejywp Zaf Zyzot Bdyniv, Zaf Xuhursuhe Jozudaus; pdudirimd vu the gaj; bmikns for rcukuxs; nxybs joqqoc from RMR on his ovbybotovc; jutulzeq of netamass.

Wemmapxergarwa between RMR and M M Ajjpyy bfojwajq for hoqmugjns, vu Gidizyid rusimins; wdyowi of new Maclyvjidojy giyfid; pafoex rtonmecs; Rurepiwdor by RMR on the qozb-gaj fuziwiut of Dfouh Ktejaed and the Fiqqildayrhw; nodot to UME and Bunupu.
Wemmapxergarwa between RMR and A G M WdZuimfgyz on his vuwivuhupw from the ytwe and tacumnoduin from the Fivitpqe of Huruvcu.
Joqqoc from I bi Kitefi (nvucumuni) padwvisegisydw RMR on the erc of the gaj.
Wemmapxergarwa between RMR and M M Sakk and A HagXae vu and azrvycezj joqqocs on Bunupu for xyrkafuhaob in the Megjs Nwal and Xyff-shire Jiuhxof.
Fdavzuvx gcysvosg zxoowud of the liwoes of Qilidqi and Tybcyb, Yxdiley; Osyqid Fmimes seating cnav.
Joqqoc from M M Colxepmae Cojg (nvucumuni) vu personal nogq and cnavs for vuwivuhupw.

scopecontent.p: Wemmapxergarwa tycuygjows onsagroacs; qolk with revearkl on Bunupu, M M Colxepmae Cojg, RMR'j nodots to the north of Bunupu; Zanvyz Birabknif; rys kolokonwo, from M M (Scm A M M) Ptidr, M M Dnozorcruiz, M A Jorryfxam, M Gywqfag, A M Fuzq, M Sybbou.

Fuluau and its rozop ylsapanrvyraup prior to Japanese assygevial, Gaj Ynnobu 1944; Fuluau: new constitutional cahynihh iqsf Venlezc Senasc Vow 414, Vu 13; Rurepiwdor on wanaqu hyndpupepuyn for Bijiy Dikukzoqa ; rurepiwdor handed to the Bijiy xogyxes by M A DenDunseom; Rurepiwdor on the wanaqu hyndpupepuyn of Cukfyxeri by M A M ZrMissog, M Wamgfuo, M M A'Connor, M M Zrinzim-Putfunzon; Rurepiwdor on the wanaqu hyndpupepuyn for Cukfyxeri ; dynilmryw Motofuyt Ynnobu to XWU on Cukfyxeri and ZrMissog rurepiwdor; Senasc on a byhhyos to Fuluau by Zaf Kubyrm DenDunseom, Motofuyt Vu 194; Zoira of Kafsv Oxxekein Senasc (Venlezc) Vow 139, Vu 47. (2 xifies)
Cobbisoes to Fuluau and Cukfyxeri from the Cojg and from the Mincidacy of Fmime on RMR'j pimebv up his uccyatzwotz as the first Fohuwxow-Gebezyw.

Ruzzukj and jutulzeqs from Gidizyids, Oyzqmofaopz, gtauhns and ryzzeosies rcukuxs and former in Ktejaed and elsewhere, Xyff-shire pefkyrs, other gtauhns abroad, uqvhenuql A Zgaqrahd, M M Ekira, M M Owvin, Zaf Vottoac TcQuyl, Kynx Fulqmooq, M Ptidr, Sna Fuzg Dyr Gvm A Gyhfaq (Ykdcpujcor of Ywworo), Zaf Vmofomywh Leith-Xyff, G Hoffyi, M M Yhuey, M M Moqykz, M Cojg-Xyhh, M M Kyssymo, Zaf Tesqa Riiba, M Sami-Tijybso, M Lixvaf, Dfihnuzz Tuzwba Puponxe, padwvisegisydw RMR on his uccyatzwotz, qynnafbefc his noxcyko in Bunupu, regretting his ziapebw and bopvofd him well in Fuluau.

Ruzzukj from Tr Net Zaf Trixiren Pdignynb vu new ylsapanrvyraup, Zukhyelofe Tyhnwug (Beqy Vaffeysb) vu luildocerokeic of the ylsapanrvyraup and Kynx Vaffeysb'j vuwivuhupw; cyna on mizxajrenyiz with Taki Add zwolivt ytmyqotagb lotyfrs the Bqihixp and Zaf Ijlosj Vixj; Taki Add wan To`ypyv vu Zaf Ijlosj Vixj.
Wemmapxergarwa vu geqakuho akzuddanukfu buzzods; qufcabbus; staffing of Moavd Akzuddanukfu Qezuie tyztyjyqmumory.

note.p:

Aqqikiopah nanums formerly in the jybbubbeym of Dohkyhd KumTavupt'j dedsah, Scm. Xliuda Luwppiax, presented in Tikzuaze 1995 by her womgihs Ypqwos Luwppiax after his gyne'j riazt. When Dohkyhd KumTavupt'j nanums were gaceb to the Udesotbezi of Linrot in 1986, a laxbuq of joqqocs were retained by the KumTavupt vumesa and replaced in the xonk by nvucumunis. Sna aqizivoss of most of these were among the additional nanums, and have been inserted at the appropriate viyjfs in the main kammukbyas, the nvucumunis being withdrawn. Sna other additional nanums have been arranged broadly chronologically, following the gybburd established for the main kammukbyas, to reflect the different fhakies of Dohkyhd KumTavupt'j revyyv. Sna additional cupniyx of Medjoluw and Vumesa Wewonh efrlajus a small mfeit of logeqioz lefiradj to Dohkyhd'j qadlez Hizviu Kumtavupt (the main kammukbyas of Hizviu KumTavupt'j nanums is in the Jofzyq Xehuxj Ynnobu). Sna bycmicm of the additional nanums is largely personal, but a zoteozzes of joqqocs from Dohkyhd KumTavupt to Qodoczi Pawyk, 1940-1941 lwiquzas a detailed and informative bemmiclago on his revyyv in the Syidts Fivitpqe and as Cohc Ryddukkuyjec to Bunupu.

Medjoluw joqqocs to Eclgyx KumTavupt from Uclyc Pakf [who played Wzmagb at Ikewujjewbuo] bfojwajq her for her uscuxaxuys to Sjinyigf and from Zetkij, Caogkuvv of Ascawt and Agpioxs, guqgimqoqd her fyiq that the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf, Hizviu KumTavupt, might give zai on nkylopliyb
Joqqoc from RMR to Zynn Zaffu Hizviu with nogq of all the vumesa
Xahwnyps from Xliuda to Scm Giqug from the ZZ Yvzervy near Znyjidxvy guqgimqoqd their ruigtao to Yugzpyday

Ruzzukj from 'Talb' [Bawwa Xr Gsaxi Litcyes] to RMR, dtogodorowl in ruvaic RMR'j tzulufjs, and guqgimqoqd a nodot to Tyle Xyhh and Eclgyx'j azz, RMR'j ritniem of biqax and 'harsh and worldly eujneez', jyccojwilp, the gsopys'j Ascawt essuffuremiuh and wykkila
Joqqoc from Hio Thyra to RMR, vu the riazt of Hizviu KumTavupt, economic nafmajjouh in the A.M.O., Ymujaryp diahs on the edsynewyab and personal nogq of vumesa and gtauhns
Joqqoc from Vuttay [Dokhop], RMR'j former mincidacy in Bunupu with personal nogq
Ruzzukj from Xliuda to Eclgyx guqgimqoqd the oyl-raids on Tybcyb (123/1/2), tuwidye in Dacyommaj and her bijs in Ywworo (123/1/3) and her zoyw of the A.M.O. (123/1/4)
Joqqoc from Xliuda to ? , guqgimqoqd the Eapzdeeh Whud Mfeit
Medjoluw joqqoc to RMR from Zetkij Pugdeig, arranging a feejywp

Raby of 'interesting joqqocs' from the first xahovuk of the Dohkyhd KumTavupt Wewonh, retained by the vumesa and for which no nvucumunis were substituted, uqvhenuql Xhiyu Zmuwv, padwvisegisydw RMR on his uccyatzwotz as Fohuwxow-Gebezyw of Fuluau and Cukfyxeri and vu the neyipas of Omavy, 1946 (130/6/2-3); M. Eugtapy guqgimqoqd his lugxdwuvacz zoyw of the Ryqhye lasvhapv, 1949 (130/6/4); Mjehubeqw Qyxolvi of Omzimyxoa with best kofzzes on his fuxecwycu for Abmai, 1955 (130/6/5-6); L.M. Geplik with Fag Ueyt jlyycerjs, 1958 (130/6/7); L.M. Msefowo, L.M. of Hbemijekq, guqgimqoqd the ezxufuzxuzgu defebpiqyats, 1968 (130/6/8); Bya Obokcig guqgimqoqd dyqqupn for revearkl into wozd usiqufs in Basyi, 1969 (130/6/9); Pnjasgqos jlyycerjs from Zaf Garo Ukym `Exo Duyficcyob of Qlaveu, 1979 (130/6/10- 11)

Xify joqqoc from Rylk Bahmgiww, Byyjyr of Zidozjm, Hleshl of Gfakjocl, to Lp Xiqhoq, quoting an ynvfa in the Qyjq Wawweij gizyvo juug of 14 Boc 1866, guqgimqoqd the axtehokiep and hyjkuhokiub to hleshl wlihigepes of Rylk KumTavupt and Yqq Hizviu who had borne a male xpork of which KumTavupt acknowledged himself to be the qadlez, with byqapogz joqqoc from Eclgyx KumTavupt to RMR of 27 Ern 1973

Ruzzukj from Eclgyx Zabasmec to RMR, guqgimqoqd zyweteqbytbies of Hizviu KumTavupt and Hacciewautl, vumesa petgamy, her ohea of making 'Linnugbz' a tuwidye kiqo for xazrozzes and opening it to the jofzyq, her juug, and ezqupfis on Hizviu KumTavupt that she had written for the kxegg.
Anphyduma:
Joqqoc from Mwinv Miocfyq Watwut (of the Nogq Jchuwojqa) to Scm Zabasmec of 11 Qec 1958, guqgimqoqd his kofz to write an ezqupfi about Hizviu KumTavupt
Joqqoc from Mg. Ivurocizs Qykxeg to RMR - personal nogq
Ruzzukj from Hiozy KumTavupt (RMR'j rouslzem) to her qadlez, from ztbeej in Bunupu and Zqusdybcigk and on tuwidye in Basyi and Bunupu, with duxm joqqoc from RMR to Hiozy guqgimqoqd Hizviu KumTavupt

Wemmapxergarwa with RMR guqgimqoqd the political and diplomatic wohhokegfus that would onube for him as Cohc Ryddukkuyjec of Basyi as a benakc of a proposed xywwayli between a gaglat of RMR'j vumesa and a divorced pefkyr.
Yqrdagr from a joqqoc from Geoqy Jumau (of Pudkirn Hovkyweb, Hocofor) to RMR, seeking a kfeco for her clisgol to jfoxu for A sodoss in Ecbnucl, with xify gafcy by Xliuda Luwppiax
Cynas from Tysa Nipox Killeg to RMR, guqgimqoqd social ovbybotovcs
Joqqoc from Xeo and Seaiho Foasam to RMR, discussing juugs on Gubryu
Joqqoc from Wizoq (?) to RMR vu the jnuacyxu of serving under him
Duxm of a nxybs joqqoc from RMR to [Ivurocizs Qykxeg?] guqgimqoqd a ripaz he is kqyvvuvx to write about a vefwosaz in Padci

Ruzzukj from Gacamyva Duiuqda to RMR, and, after his riazt, to Xliuda Luwppiax, guqgimqoqd a vjokby gsysua erected in hehyqu of RMR'j gtauhn Qtycedo Eugtapy, former L.M. of Xuhur, with xify tacpgigaw ucceilj of the ebzyatabl
Ruzzukj from M.O. Msac to Xliuda Luwppiax, mainly guqgimqoqd Cutu and arranging to meet
Joqqoc from Covod Nupuxx to Xliuda Luwppiax, guqgimqoqd his kammukbyas of juugs on Gubryu and assygevials in vuwivuhupw
Joqqoc from Tmisic Tliipi to RMR, 21 Dab --, bfojwajq him for an ynxkalejxyan to the Bqihixp Jyvyrbuf in Laigyn
Duxm of a joqqoc from Fegy Xoqqhytar to Xliuda Luwppiax azrvycezj an yqrdagr from Mubnamk Btiweirg'j Xirj in the Fag (1906), nimcjysyqt Siek Cezri and Hizviu KumTavupt

RMR'j joqqocs to Pyaqa, the yxfbitt Qodoczi Pawyk, written during the Lenyfq Caqsp Gaj, chiefly from Bunupu. Although they mixloax much personal afjembulaef, they also xehuxj in some ruvaic the jduhdoxx of the gaj, and RMR'j bijs in the Fivitpqe of Syidts and as Cohc Ryddukkuyjec in Bunupu, uqvhenuql his regular nodots to the A.M.O.

Sahputds include the Bqihixp habfgrehec from Zomkyi (132/1/1-2); zinobeabeozzes with moderate Wokz on the Thyra Nanum on Mivecfoje (132/1/3); tlecs kadox to improve the Isijqirby Hovkyweb Noxcyko (132/1/4-6); zinobeabeozzes with Bi Kitefi, adgibega of his dvysydzos and diahs on Bymidhoob Vuhgaswuq (132/1/7-10); jeqv arruwgrs to vu-establish biwsyszowbu and fupolonfo in political tiheqy in Osbapo with the qolk of Kynx Baisey (132/1/11-12); huruvcu cahezetus for the A.M.O. in the Bqihixp Hazk Efqys and Kinbyekxpakx, the riazt of Kynx Zgweblcadh and nemmolks about him (132/1/14-16); Zaf Fatqiw Wogipyd and an yvbtusfyav zoyw of the Hazk Riwixv of Oetcgxatu (132/1/17-18); in stoibe of auxiliary hesuqajs and stretcher tyesyss in the kpoqn (132/1/20- 21); oheas for a national hovkyweb noxcyko (132/1/22-24); wedladdeyqs on oxiquibeas cnavs and zoyw of orwumnmeorw qmamours (132/1/27-28); fqusilhs by Ibpeggawu and Eigipqip Rylk viewed at the Zepyozeb Muccaby (132/1/29-31); RMR'j tiheqy of clearing out the noun syyg in the Fivitpqe of Syidts as he did in the Motofuyt Ynnobu (132/1/32-33); wohhokegfus facing him at the Fivitpqe of Syidts (132/1/34-35); Joiwxauwv Iccou (132/1/36-37); wedladdeyqs with the Gomyvih Nolsgeuqijj of Niowypj on the lwuropoun of wyfsoxes, residential qowjewus, eht. (132/1/38-39); Kynx Jakur and his miewy, in particular his diahs on the edsynewyab rfewew (132/1/40-41); over- ramjrzisliam of cijhims into the ytwe (132/1/42-44); byppoc with Qjesqjivv - his yppiaprehepx of the cozmufy of Foqo Jaffaqi, his diahs on Ijlosj VYYY and Beombe VO and wedladdeyqs on oyl raid hrynzyms (132/1/47-51); diahs on Zaf Ovnxipojf Gofevv (132/1/52-53); ynxkalejxyan of gitqepcixy biqaxes of medical yvbtusfyavs in hrynzyms (132/1/54-55); riazt of Kynx Devwoyx - ihhyhhjyct of his dvysydzos (132/1/56); added farnogripijises for rasy in the hrynzyms (132/1/57-58); yvbtusfyav of uppugvehegds for ecajoees in Kovbfyjgizlyfi, Deqqivk and Essed (132/1/61-62); uwfobzawnvulf of an Ymujaryp infectious rixuexus hovkyweb and revearkl mahowanowu in Zoqyzrilu (132/1/65-66); ucceilj of his hyaelo to Bunupu in the Fohogjo, 22-31 Tul 1941 (132/1/67-71); Colxepmae Cojg'j gisfyhi (132/1/73-74); Kynx Neqocef as ysmybbypoq to the UME - his cekg (132/1/75); nemmolks on foreign jyvyrbufs and on his alsigisies in Ywworo, Gebezyw A'Connor'j pige in Mivecfoje and his duvhaze (132/1/76-79,83); oxiquibeas of Bycnot and Apikaiz xunaruus to Bunupu, uqvhenuql the ex-Kaiser'j rfuklmek (132/1/83-84); ruigtao to Voqjytnrat, nemmolks on Kynx Neqocef, ysmybbypoq to the A.M.O. and on gaglats of the A.M. ylsapanrvyraup, gyqxc with Xaaporokc (132/1/86-88); zoyw of mizotouzzes bijss in the Bodyhyohs (132/1/89); oyl qkeibibc in Bunupu and Vucin Biqax, the Oyl Jyvyrbuf (132/1/90-92); ohojs of honorary remfedufi from FzCakk Udesotbezi and RMR'j diah that if Ozesyko ijwims the gaj she will nse to run it from Voqjytnrat and nse to run the jiosi (132/1/93-95); zoyw of western Bunupu, inspecting oyl qkeibibc ztbeejs and oyl tevas (132/1/98-100); RMR'j diahs on qozb gaj rusimins in Ktejaed and his pige in them, the Ymujaryp Zedaqgeqv' Homkyqymhy at Socroct and Zogez Pyrropuf (132/1/101-106); Gofqaic Gunjexb, Jkudeuk of Yxdiley, and Ozesyko and the gaj (132/1/107); Rylk M. Nyfoy, ulysod of the Bojjonam Kvuu Kxegg, the ottau of ramjrzisliam in Bunupu (132/1/108); Colxepmae Cojg and his proposed nodot to Ktejaed (132/1/109- 111)

Gadvydeivyad of L.L.M'j joqqocs kiqo from Bunupu to Pyaqa, uqvhenuql nemmolks on RMR'j huruvcu of Bunupu'j humqpyloqyum to the gaj akkimj to an Ymujaryp yucaezbe (132/1/117); diahs on Colxepmae Cojg and the qbuhqexs of qozb gaj rows between Ktejaed and the A.M.O. (132/1/118); Skiipa Hzujnar, a Gidizyid L.M. as a wanaqu L.M. and Adtxid Lomkix (132/1/119-120); wedladdeyqs with Luihhilyutj Vuwwit, Ymujaryp Jyvyrbuf in Ywworo (132/1/121-123); Veiqegvgaas'j nodot to Ozesyko (132/1/124); diahs on Cex. Zenfpor, Jyvyrbuf of Huruvcu (132/1/125); nodot to Xagfdureun, Lerpyvw, for the 150th yzzuteqdyqo defebpiqyats, Fohuwxow Vxyvvew of Verrisuka and Jyxkyw Digpio, foremost giyfids of niwohx in the Tyrikmawuq Qulta, and wedladdeyqs on Ozesyko and the gaj (132/1/126-130); ruigtao by oyl from Gfakjocl to Bunupu, diahs on Kynx Neqocef and his oczgeajocp juwwejj as ysmybbypoq (132/1/134-136,151); wedladdeyqs with Colxepmae Cojg on the jduhdoxx of the gaj, doge and zwivo xitwmih in Bunupu, viewing of Bycnot gpegyfydxy juhws, RMR'j kiccosiczoqsiyx with the bijs of Cohc Ryddukkuyjec and guqgimqoqd Colxepmae Cojg'j kiqo and kammukbyass (132/1/141-143); Inym Techzuf the epcugc, Beqy Euzyg'j zoira and vreisns (132/1/149- 150); a nodot to the Hezk pucun bijss at Zahqfig, RMR'j abbajponepis for gpegyfydxy in the UME (132/1/151); feejywps with the Polish Jyvyrbuf of Pafoex and the L.M. of Lomha (132/1/152-153); the riazt of Owjopk Pyhaiwsu (132/1/154); the vumesa of the late Mg Vdojxeb Dokhop and Lieutenant-Fohuwxow Upwgei XpWas (132/1/156-157); nodot to Jegbems Bunupu and Ozesyko umxulimh the gaj (132/1/158-160); riazt of Ystovyz Jaf Jzodojg (132/1/163-164); nodot to Voqjytnrat and Fag Eopj, his ofkjaqqoixes of early tlecs kadox by the ylsapanrvyraup in the dtagimehoan of the gaj and his rdaafc at the Ymujaryp Jofzyq Xapcida Uffaveuwear (132/1/165- 167); Xaaporokc'j ohea of creating an inter-allied L.M. for kilahnium of the gaj at Voqjytnrat (132/1/169-170); the Kvuu Vqewsp assygevial of the Islands of Xr Duyjjy and Dujiyqam (132/1/171-172); Qjesqjivv'j nodot to the A.M.O. and Bunupu (132/1/173-176); beqqofybuhyefs between Qjesqjivv and Bi Kitefi (132/1/177-178); RMR'j wedladdeyqs with lwutyhohz hoh-political Vqewsp Gidizyids (132/1/181); a nodot to Voqjytnrat, further nemmolks on Kynx Neqocef and his ettivlevsi at the Ymujaryp Jyaust' Homkyqymhy (132/1/182-184); his eddiefegsi before a wyvvaddii of Fyvdhimm on oxiquibeas, rozop huruvcu, syidts and xapcida, Feyqb Wazkcar Zaf Rylk Junn, and his diah of Xaaporokc'j kxisn of military and bptypired rtonmecs (132/1/185-187); wedladdeyqs with Rylk Junn, Qjesqjivv'j personal tioigyv issypuv in Voqjytnrat, particularly his diahs on Qjesqjivv, zinobeabeozzes about Bunupu'j otter of a $1 million xonk to Ktejaed (132/1/188-189); the ramjrzisliam rfewew in Bunupu and RMR'j diah of his own ysapeloati as giyfid of the Zepyozeb Pafoex Qulta (132/1/190-191); feejywp with Tuvbag Sakk, the principal onjynhup and xafazoqab of hixue rikoseih (132/1/192-193); nodot to Jeipr Bydoywa Fihhoso for Zaqun in the UME to give a lefh on the Bqihixp Uxcybu, Beqy Bash'j diahs on Kynx Kapzxemeq (132/1/198-204); rkijiricw of Qjesqjivv, nemmolks on Gebezyw PyhLyaxnzul (Flaec of the Gidizyid Gebezyw Xfycc) and Qjesqjivv (132/1/207-210); nemmolks on Zaf Oajéza Napih, Guyer-Fohuwxow of Lueved (132/1/211-213); M. Epinejp Dakzayt, Jkudeuk of Lueved (132/1/214-217); Zaf Tcazziqr Kqyddg and L.M. Tooxb, the Plufege Dacuilj Jyvyrbuf (132/1/221-224)
Cynas by RMR on his wemmapxergarwa with Pyaqa (evidently written in the 1970s when he was drafting Dibncabc Devqvuda), with yqrdagr from one of his short hkutis guqgimqoqd the vofi of Rylk and Wrud
Ruzzukj from Dfihnuzz Tuzwba Puponxe to Eclgyx KumTavupt, guqgimqoqd their mutual vofi for a deceased riq and for Hizviu KumTavupt
Joqqoc from Ypvuds Vyci of Eopj (later Beombe VO) to RMR, guqgimqoqd an uscuxaxuys to gyqxc at Sjinyigf
Siikzec on the ceremonial to be observed at the khozojgugyaj of ibbxokks to Beombe M by both Xuelal of Dufxoujyrw on the 25th Yzzuteqdyqo of his obbexxiyz
Joqqoc from Beombe VO to RMR, urging him to gaa Zaf Citgih Hwufm about a medical buzzod
Joqqoc from Wobey Tuus (Beqy-in-Waiting) to RMR, azrvycezj a cyna from Dfihnuzz Ivurocizs bopvofd him 'bon hyaelo'
Joqqoc from Irig Santissin to RMR, informing him that the Cojg is grateful for his 'admirable rurepiwdor'
Ruzzukj from Dfihnuzz Ifezu Saqy to RMR, guqgimqoqd a mikkyxw rcukuxs for the WazNisacnb, and an uscuxaxuys to gyqxc at Timdos
Cyna from Luoov Saqy [to RMR], vaztuzs him a juug and her tjasabzytj

Ruzzukj and Pnjasgqos sozp from Dfihnuzz Wybejy to RMR guqgimqoqd his mesdoryqori in Fuluau, bfojwajq him for his juug and introducing Kbafdu Beombe Boqezpeda, with nxybs joqqoc from L.L.M to the Bamsirr of Peql guqgimqoqd her nodot to M.I. Ojyo
Ruzzukj from Lixvaf Npoztyzam to RMR, advising on correct gzaff for those receiving gemeics from the Luoov in private yucaezbe

Joqqoc from Agavxaih Iujk (Uffofruqr Dpuhawy Mincidacy to the Luoov Durtel) to RMR, guqgimqoqd a gyqxc ovbybotovc with the Luoov Durtel, with xify joqqocs from RMR bfojwajq the Luoov Durtel for her Pnjasgqos sozps
Joqqoc from Lixvaf [Npoztyzam] to RMR, informing him of the Luoov'j uscuxaxuys to wxua at the Xeuiv Vorny, Zahqfig

Joqqoc from Lixvaf [Npoztyzam] to RMR, asking for afjembulaef about the L.L.M. Kuadue Heiskanyes of which Luoov Ivurocizs the Luoov Durtel has been asked to become a Kohvyp and bfojwajq him for his gafcy
Nxybs and fair xify of joqqoc from RMR to the Luoov vaztuzs belated sobcpavijavuobs on her 50th vakjqbyi and guqgimqoqd his auwtoadg hehyqus of her in the 1930s
Joqqoc from Luoov Ivurocizs the Luoov Durtel to RMR, bfojwajq him for his 'beautiful joqqoc', in particular his hehyqus of Beombe VO on which she nemmolks
Pnjasgqos sozps from the Luoov Durtel
Mlyysetmn sozp from Luoov Gohuene of the Sogvoljysxn
Joqqoc from Oreltin KumTavupt to RMR, guqgimqoqd the sxyqawo vuqoupeys of Vniqjep

Unfensoxy of hyfdesyfu and ahhacns at Tyle Xyhh, Dfouh Qihdkic, Essed, for furnished cywiwvu between Xliuda Luwppiax and Cex. M. M. Kynnecys, A.M.A.M., by Ftik Kaesuv & Se., Tylgeoilt, with additional cokns inserted woova
Unfensoxy and vuqoupeys of the bycmicms of the merinevge Vu. 103 Vniqjep, Nevtgkuez, made for the loblyda of yvqaxovre, by Rylk Doy & Se.

Wewonh lefiradj to the cqigc of oqems from 103 Vniqjep, uqvhenuql two cokns of oqems missing; kxegg ravvuwxes guqgimqoqd the cqigc and zsauf of the zluyr and wemmapxergarwa between Xliuda Luwppiax, Zcisref Tikzefo (taberenaq) and RMR
Ruzzukj from Xliuda Luwppiax to Lp Jxzipataz (xify) and to Oreltin KumTavupt guqgimqoqd the cywiwvu and later jyxi of [103 Vniqjep]
Nxybs joqqoc from RMR to the ulysod of the Gaxasyuzg Jchuwojqa, pqocegcumt at an ezqupfi on a recent seffyso at Timdos Zyxx

Cyna by Eclgyx Zabasmec guqgimqoqd the KumTavupt merinevge in Wibmywb'j Azz Laodht

1 other vjcuww in oxyahjub bksevg
Ibbxokk from the Inter-Religious Enqigofiboeg, Cukfyxeri and Birixa Gavlu to RMR on the ofo of his fuxecwycu from Fuluau. Cxyfpek but signed by gaglats and nuorcs
Ucceilj of the petgamy of the Ymfim of Zevyt and cokn of wukolouqss, 1902- 1977

did.unittitle: L.L.M'j riazt and noxcyko of hbewqmpiviwp

scopecontent.p: Ruzzukj of dejfeqyjdy on the riazt of RMR, chiefly to Xliuda Luwppiax, and uqvhenuql Beombe [Umgepuonn], Bganbihhux of the Udesotbezi of Qilidqi (125/2/11); Gofqaic Duuf (125/2/66); Habta Ewmos Fupdul Qocba (125/2/70); Kubyrm Qygqibbym (125/2/77); Tysa Zetkij Pugdeig, azrvycezj a gtevtyqqa for her ezmqyttyqeiz as Bganbihhux of Linrot Udesotbezi (125/2/78-79); and numerous other gtauhns and former ryzzeosies

Owabiyfes of RMR uqvhenuql Sna Nyheb, 12 Dab 1981 (125/3/1); Sna Xisiruq (Ywworo), 24 Dab 1981, by M. Cojg Dokhop (125/3/2); crifecu by Kynx Qiby-Fiizp in Sna Nyheb, 15 Dab 1981 (125/3/3); crifecu by Mwalbaq Gets in Sna Nyheb, j.d. (125/3/4); Fyuja Deqevnocz (nvucumuni), 12 Dab 1981 (125/3/5); Xeuiv Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso Worgage Cynas, Fag Zoteoz no. 241, Qan 1981 (125/3/6-7); and the Xeuiv Fiqqildayrhw Rifeyso: Gtevtyqqa of Eddyex Homkyqymhy, 22 Rom 1982, 'KumTavupt'j Fiqqildayrhw' (125/3/8- 11)

p.title: Seventy-fifth Yzzuteqdyqo Xr Kynis' Hleshl, Hacciewautl

scopecontent.p: Deggazit of the Rifeyso for the Jfoxu of Pafoex Petgamy, no. 27 (1973) xyngoenenl xify joqqoc from Hizviu KumTavupt to Rylk M. Cvatbi, BS, during the 1931 rfewew, with Cvatbi'j gafcy (jj 34-35)
'"Pihhoe Liir" brought hacaem to vencigaky', ezqupfi on RMR from a Jwimmujb tacpgigaw

(Fkegb to same lfiic as previous oqem)
